name: Ultimate Pacman
description:
It's pacman, with a twist!

Ultimate Pacman was a three-week project in which we had 2 jobs; create a retro game with a twist, and code it in the cleanest way your hands and sleep deprivation can muster.

Not only did I make handy use of Singletons, the Toolbox pattern and modular components, this was also my first project were I got busy using Finite State Machines!

View the code for this project here on github!Tools :
  • Unity 2019.3.0.1b & Unity 2019.3.0.6b
  • Sourcetree
Assets:
  • Shapes2D
  • Unity Recorder
